pcm_NG.(The site won't see your balance and no: (The site nor go see your money and dem nor go spend any money)
pcm_NG.Accept invitation from the other device: Accept invitation from de oda device
pcm_NG.Also in the Settings menu, you will find: Also for de Settings menu, you go find security options like setting a password.
pcm_NG.Also, don't forget to delete your seed: Also, nor forget to delete your seed
pcm_NG.Are you sure you want to delete the back: You sure say wan delete dis backup words so?
pcm_NG.Before receiving funds, it is highly rec: Before you receive funds, dem dey highly recommend say make you backup your wallet keys.
pcm_NG.Bind the payment to a condition: Bind de payment to a condition
pcm_NG.Both you and {{correspondent.name}} enab: Both you and {{correspondent.name}} don enable local chat history recording.
pcm_NG.Choose the device to send to: Choose de device wey u wan send give
pcm_NG.Could not create payment proposal: E nor fit create payment proposal
pcm_NG.Could not create using the specified ext: E nor fit create using extended private key
E nor fit create using de extended private key
pcm_NG.Could not create: Invalid wallet seed: E nor fit create: de wallet seed dey invalid
pcm_NG.Could not fetch transaction history: E nor fit bring de transaction history
pcm_NG.Could not import. Check input file and p: E nor fit import. Check de input file and password
pcm_NG.Device name is visible to other devices: Device name nor dey show for other devices you dey communicate with.
pcm_NG.Do not clone wallets, stop using the ori: Nor clone wallets, stop to dey use original wallets with dis seed.
Nor use am take clone de wallet.
pcm_NG.Don't see your language on Crowdin? Cont: You nor see your language for Crowdin? Contact de owner for Crowdin! We go love to support your language.
pcm_NG.Either you or {{correspondent.name}} hav: Either you or {{correspondent.name}} get chat history history recording wey disabled. History nor dey save for any body for now.
pcm_NG.Enter the pairing code received from the: Enter de pairing code wey you receive from de oda device, or use your own camera (de icon dey up for de right corner) to take scan de QR code wey dey display for de oda device.
pcm_NG.I affirm that I have read, understood, a: I concur say i don read, understood and agree for dis terms.
pcm_NG.If the condition is not met, I can take: If dem nor meet de condition, I fit take dis money back after
pcm_NG.If the peer doesn't pay, I can take my m: If de peer nor pay, I fit take my money back after
pcm_NG.If you have moved this backup from anoth: If you don move dis backup from anoda device, stop to dey use de original one immediately after you create de backup. Nor ever clone wallets. If you need access from many devices, use multisig.
pcm_NG.If you plan to restore the wallet on ano: If you dey plan to restore de wallet for anoda device, stop to dey use am for de current one immediately after you create de backup. Nor ever clone wallets. If you need access from many devices, use multisig.
pcm_NG.Initial transaction history synchronizat:
Initial transaction history synchronization fit take some minutes for wallets wey get many transactions.
Abeg wait.
pcm_NG.Keep only data relevant to you: Keep only de data wey relevant to you
pcm_NG.Label: Label
pcm_NG.Once you have written your wallet seed d: Once you don write your wallet seed down, e dey recommended make you delete am from dis device.
pcm_NG.Paste your paper wallet private key here: Paste your paper wallet private key for here
pcm_NG.Please choose how much data to store in: Abeg choose how much data wey dem go store for your wallet
pcm_NG.Please enter the required fields: Abeg enta de fields wey dem require
pcm_NG.Please name this device: Abeg put name for dis device
pcm_NG.Post values into datafeeds manually, be: Post values into datafeeds manually, make u be oracle.
pcm_NG.Post your profile data, anything you wan: Post your profile data, anytin wey you wan talj about yourself.
E dey connect again to Wallet Service...
pcm_NG.Required number of signatures: Number of signatures wey dem required
pcm_NG.Scan status finished with error: Scan status don finish with error
pcm_NG.Scan the above QR code using the other d: Scab de QR code wey dey up using de oda device, or send dis pairing code give de oda device:
pcm_NG.Share this wallet address to receive pay: Share dis address to fit take receive payments.
pcm_NG.Show the Wallet Seed Anyway: Still show de Wallet Seed sha
pcm_NG.Syncing... {{index.count_unhandled_priva: E dey sync... {{index.count_unhandled_private_payments}} private payments wey remain
pcm_NG.The hub for receiving messages from othe: De hub wey dem for dey receive messages from oda devices.
pcm_NG.The peer receives this payment if: De peer go receive dis payment if
pcm_NG.The vote will be signed by all your fund: All your funded addresses go sign de vote
pcm_NG.The wallet vendor will be able to know s: De wallet vendor go dey able to know some of your balances and go dey able to see wich transactions be your own, but you fit start to dey use de wallet at once wen de wallet don dey fully functional.
pcm_NG.There are no wallets to make this paymen: No wallets dey to fit make dis payment
pcm_NG.This choice cannot be changed later: Dem nor fit change dis choice later
pcm_NG.This option is better for privacy but wi: Dis option dey beta for privacy but e go take plenty gigabytes of storage and de initial sync go take several days. CPU load go high during de sync.
pcm_NG.This transaction has become invalid; pos: Dis transaction don become invalid, maybe na cos of double spend attempt.
pcm_NG.To be able to restore everything, please: To fit be able to restore everytin, abeg create a full backup (find de option for de menu)
pcm_NG.To bind the payment to a condition, plea: To fit bind de payment to a condition, abeg click de peer's address for chat
pcm_NG.To protect your privacy, new addresses a: To fit protect your privacy, dem dey generate new address automatically once you use dem.
pcm_NG.Unable to send transaction proposal: E nor fit dey able to send transaction proposal
pcm_NG.WARNING: This seed was created with a pa: WARNING: Dem create dis seed with a passphrase. Both mnemonic and passphrase dey needed to fit take recover dis wallet.
De Wallet see nor dey available.
pcm_NG.Write it down and keep it somewhere safe: Write am down and keep am for somewhere wey say.
pcm_NG.Your wallet key will be encrypted. Passw: Dem go encrypt your wallet key. Dem nor fit recover password. Make sure say you write am down
pcm_NG.Your wallet will be created on this devi: Dem go create your wallet put for dis device, keep am safe. You fit see your backup options for de Settings menu.
pcm_NG.can unlock the contract after it expires: can fit unlock de contract after e expires in

pcm_NG.locked by pending payments: e dey locked by pending payments
